meanings.definition: A person who invests money alongside others in a joint venture.
meanings.sent1: My coinvestors and I pooled our money to invest in the new business.
meanings.sent2: The coinvestors in the project each contributed funds for the venture.
meanings.sent3: The coinvestors joked that they were like a financial team on a mission.
meanings.sent4: In the world of investments, coinvestors are like financial comrades on a shared journey.
meanings.sent5: The group of coinvestors worked together to make their investment successful.
